page.title: 04MARKS HOUSE IN HAMPTON MAGNA
page.content: Off the porch leads the down stairs toilet and hall and off the hall come the stairs. The kitchen has a gas cooker,washing machine,fridge, food processor and radio.Our lounge has a television,video,settee,2 chairs,nest of 3 tables and a sideboard.The dining room has a table,6 chairs and a cupboard.Upstairs the bathroom has a sink,W.C.,bath and airing cupboard. There are 3 bedrooms.Mine has a single bed,wardrobe,desk and chest of drawers on which I keep a computer and television.My sister has a bed,2 wardrobes and a chairbed used for visitors.My parents have a double bed, 2 wardrobes,a table and a teasmaid for making an early morning cup of tea. Outside in the garage is a freezer and a car.The other car is kept on the drive.The front and back gardens are lawns with flower borders.
